description: The capital city of the Arabasta Kingdom, featuring the royal palace. The site of the climactic battle between rebel and royal forces.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Vow to Defeat Crocodile
keyEvents.description: Luffy, while in Alubarna with Pell, vows to make Crocodile pay despite his injuries.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the final confrontation in the capital city.

keyEvents.title: Premature Cannon Fire
keyEvents.description: A Baroque Works infiltrator fires a cannon prematurely, starting the civil war.
keyEvents.significance: Represents the culmination of Crocodile's manipulation.

keyEvents.title: Rebel Army vs. Royal Army Clash Begins
keyEvents.description: The rebel forces charge through Alubarna's south gate as the civil war officially begins.
keyEvents.significance: The tragic result of manipulation, with thousands fighting in the capital.

description: The area outside Alubarna where the Baroque Works officer agents waited to intercept Vivi. The location where the Super Spot-Billed Duck Quiz strategy was executed.

keyEvents.title: Super Spot-Billed Duck Quiz Strategy
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats execute their decoy plan with six Super Spot-Billed Ducks wearing identical cloaks.
keyEvents.significance: Clever tactical maneuver forcing Baroque Works to split their forces.

keyEvents.title: Baroque Works Agents Split to Chase Decoys
keyEvents.description: The Baroque Works officer agents split into three groups to pursue the decoy ducks.
keyEvents.significance: The agents fall for the trap, splitting their forces.

description: The area between the rebel and royal armies where Vivi attempted to stop the war. The site where thousands of soldiers clashed in civil war.

keyEvents.title: Vivi's Desperate Plea to Stop the War
keyEvents.description: Vivi stands between the armies, desperately trying to stop the civil war.
keyEvents.significance: Heartbreaking moment showing the powerlessness of even a princess to stop war once it begins.

keyEvents.title: Karoo Shields Vivi from Trampling
keyEvents.description: Karoo protects Vivi by covering her with his body as thousands of soldiers charge.
keyEvents.significance: Powerful display of loyalty and sacrifice.

keyEvents.title: Mr. 2 Disguises as Usopp
keyEvents.description: Mr. 2 approaches Vivi disguised as Usopp on horseback.
keyEvents.significance: Tactical infiltration attempt using shape-shifting powers.

keyEvents.title: Vivi Discovers Mr. 2's Deception
keyEvents.description: Vivi sees through Mr. 2's disguise based on her knowledge of her friends.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the deep bonds formed between Vivi and the Straw Hats.

statusHistory.reason: Battlefield created by the civil war

description: The southern area of Alubarna where Zoro and Nami confronted Mr. 1 and Miss Doublefinger.

keyEvents.title: Zoro and Nami vs. Mr. 1 and Miss Doublefinger
keyEvents.description: The first decoy pair faces their Baroque Works opponents in the south.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up crucial battles for both Straw Hats against Devil Fruit users.

description: The western area of Alubarna where Sanji and Chopper confronted Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas.

keyEvents.title: Sanji and Chopper vs. Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas
keyEvents.description: The second decoy pair faces their opponents with unique Devil Fruit abilities.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up a battle involving Lassoo the gun-dog and underground tactics.

description: The southwestern area of Alubarna where Usopp and Matsuge were defeated by Mr. 2 Bon Clay.

keyEvents.title: Usopp and Matsuge Defeated by Mr. 2
keyEvents.description: Mr. 2 easily defeats the third decoy pair in an off-screen battle.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Mr. 2's combat prowess and enables his infiltration plan.
